Can a Covid-19 vaccine give you Covid-19? NO. It will take a few weeks for your body to build immunity after getting a COVID-19 vaccination. As a result, it's possible that you could become infected with the virus that causes COVID-19 just before or after being vaccinated.

Lots of people are talking about lockdown burnout.  For some of us working from home means bringing the work stress home, and adding it to the stress of coping with lockdown.  Talking to someone about how you really feel can be a great help.  We're here to listen 24/7 on 116 123.
